name: DocFX
help: DocFX is an API documentation generator for .NET, and currently it supports C# and VB. It generates API reference documentation from triple-slash comments in your source code. It also allows you to use Markdown files to create additional topics such as tutorials and how-tos, and to customize the generated reference documentation. DocFX builds a static HTML website from your source code and Markdown files, which can be easily hosted on any web servers (for example, github.io). Also, DocFX provides you the flexibility to customize the layout and style of your website through templates. If you are interested in creating your own website with your own styles, you can follow how to create custom template to create custom templates.

tasks.help: Generate client-only website combining API in YAML files and conceptual files.

properties.name: ChangesFile
properties.help: Set changes file.

properties.name: CleanupCacheHistory
properties.help: If set to true, docfx create a new intermediate folder for cache files, historical cache data will be cleaned up.

properties.name: Content
properties.help: Specify content files for generating documentation.

properties.name: DisableGitFeatures
properties.help: Disable fetching Git related information for articles. By default it is enabled and may have side effect on performance when the repo is large.

properties.name: DryRun
properties.help: If set to true, template will not be actually applied to the documents. This option is always used with --exportRawModel or --exportViewModel is set so that only raw model files or view model files are generated.

properties.name: EnableDebugMode
properties.help: Run in debug mode. With debug mode, raw model and view model will be exported automatically when it encounters error when applying templates. If not specified, it is false.

properties.name: ExportRawModel
properties.help: If set to true, data model to run template script will be extracted in .raw.model.json extension.

properties.name: ExportViewModel
properties.help: If set to true, data model to apply template will be extracted in .view.model.json extension.

properties.name: FALName
properties.help: Set the name of input file abstract layer builder.

properties.name: FileMetadataFilePath
properties.help: Specify a JSON file path containing fileMetadata settings, as similar to {"fileMetadata":{"key":"value"}}. It overrides the fileMetadata settings from the config file.

properties.name: FileMetadataFilePaths
properties.help: Specify a list of JSON file path containing fileMetadata settings, as similar to {"key":"value"}. It overrides the fileMetadata settings from the config file.

properties.name: ForcePostProcess
properties.help: Force to re-process the documentation in post processors. It will be cascaded from force option.

properties.name: ForceRebuild
properties.help: Force re-build all the documentation.

properties.name: GlobalMetadata
properties.help: Specify global metadata key-value pair in json format. It overrides the globalMetadata settings from the config file.

properties.name: GlobalMetadataFilePath
properties.help: Specify a JSON file path containing globalMetadata settings, as similar to {"globalMetadata":{"key":"value"}}. It overrides the globalMetadata settings from the config file.

properties.name: GlobalMetadataFilePaths
properties.help: Specify a list of JSON file path containing globalMetadata settings, as similar to {"key":"value"}. It overrides the globalMetadata settings from the config file.

properties.name: Host
properties.help: Specify the hostname of the hosted website (e.g., 'localhost' or '*').

properties.name: IntermediateFolder
properties.help: Set folder for intermediate build results.

properties.name: KeepFileLink
properties.help: If set to true, docfx does not dereference (aka. copy) file to the output folder, instead, it saves a link_to_path property inside mainfiest.json to indicate the physical location of that file.

properties.name: LruSize
properties.help: Set the LRU cached model count (approximately the same as the count of input files). By default, it is 8192 for 64bit and 3072 for 32bit process. With LRU cache enabled, memory usage decreases and time consumed increases. If set to 0, Lru cache is disabled.

properties.name: MarkdownEngineName
properties.help: Set the name of markdown engine, default is 'dfm'.

properties.name: MarkdownEngineProperties
properties.help: Set the parameters for markdown engine, value should be a JSON string.

properties.name: MaxParallelism
properties.help: Set the max parallelism, 0 is auto.

properties.name: NoLangKeyword
properties.help: Disable default lang keyword.

properties.name: OutputFolder
properties.help: Specify the output base directory.

properties.name: OutputFolderForDebugFiles
properties.help: The output folder for files generated for debugging purpose when in debug mode. If not specified, it is ${TempPath}/docfx.

properties.name: Overwrite
properties.help: Specify overwrite files used by content files.

properties.name: Port
properties.help: Specify the port of the hosted website.

properties.name: PostProcessors
properties.help: Set the order of post processors in plugins.

properties.name: PrintHelpMessage
properties.help: Print help message for this sub-command.

properties.name: RawModelOutputFolder
properties.help: Specify the output folder for the raw model. If not set, the raw model will be generated to the same folder as the output documentation.

properties.name: Resource
properties.help: Specify resources used by content files.

properties.name: SchemaLicense
properties.help: Please provide the license key for validating schema using NewtonsoftJson.Schema here.

properties.name: Serve
properties.help: Host the generated documentation to a website.

properties.name: Templates
properties.help: Specify the template name to apply to. If not specified, output YAML file will not be transformed.

properties.name: Themes
properties.help: Specify which theme to use. By default 'default' theme is offered.

properties.name: ViewModelOutputFolder
properties.help: Specify the output folder for the view model. If not set, the view model will be generated to the same folder as the output documentation.

properties.name: XRefMaps
properties.help: Specify the urls of xrefmap used by content files.

properties.name: IntermediateFolder
properties.help: The intermediate folder that store cache files.

properties.name: PrintHelpMessage
properties.help: Print help message for this sub-command.

properties.name: VersionName
properties.help: The version name of the content.

tasks.help: Download remote xref map file and create an xref archive in local.

properties.name: PrintHelpMessage
properties.help: Print help message for this sub-command.

properties.name: Uri
properties.help: Specify the url of xrefmap.

tasks.help: Get an overall guide for the command and sub-commands.
Generate an initial docfx.json following the instructions.

properties.name: ApiSourceFolder
properties.help: Specify the source working folder for source project files to start glob search.

properties.name: ApiSourceGlobPattern
properties.help: Specify the source project files' glob pattern to generate metadata.

properties.name: OnlyConfigFile
properties.help: Generate config file docfx.json only, no project folder will be generated.

properties.name: OutputFolder
properties.help: Specify the output folder of the config file. If not specified, the config file will be saved to a new folder docfx_project.

properties.name: Overwrite
properties.help: Specify if the current file will be overwritten if it exists.

properties.name: PrintHelpMessage
properties.help: Print help message for this sub-command.

properties.name: Quiet
properties.help: Quietly generate the default docfx.json.

tasks.help: Merge .net base API in YAML files and toc files.

properties.name: Content
properties.help: Specifies content files for generating documentation.

properties.name: FileMetadataFilePath
properties.help: Specify a JSON file path containing fileMetadata settings, as similar to {"fileMetadata":{"key":"value"}}. It overrides the fileMetadata settings from the config file.

properties.name: GlobalMetadata
properties.help: Specify global metadata key-value pair in json format. It overrides the globalMetadata settings from the config file.

properties.name: GlobalMetadataFilePath
properties.help: Specify a JSON file path containing globalMetadata settings, as similar to {"globalMetadata":{"key":"value"}}. It overrides the globalMetadata settings from the config file.

properties.name: PrintHelpMessage
properties.help: Print help message for this sub-command.

properties.name: TocMetadata
properties.help: Specify metadata names that need to be merged into toc file.

tasks.help: Generate YAML files from source code.

properties.name: Projects
properties.help: The projects for which the metadata should be built.

properties.name: DisableDefaultFilter
properties.help: Disable the default API filter (default filter only generate public or protected APIs).

properties.name: DisableGitFeatures
properties.help: Disable fetching Git related information for articles. By default it is enabled and may have side effect on performance when the repo is large.

properties.name: FilterConfigFile
properties.help: Specify the filter config file.

properties.name: ForceRebuild
properties.help: Force re-generate all the metadata.

properties.name: GlobalNamespaceId
properties.help: Specify the name to use for the global namespace.

properties.name: MSBuildProperties
properties.help: --property <n1>=<v1>;<n2>=<v2> An optional set of MSBuild properties used when interpreting project files. These are the same properties that are passed to msbuild via the /property:<n1>=<v1>;<n2>=<v2> command line argument.

properties.name: OutputFolder
properties.help: Specify the output base directory.

properties.name: PreserveRawInlineComments
properties.help: Preserve the existing xml comment tags inside 'summary' triple slash comments.

properties.name: PrintHelpMessage
properties.help: Print help message for this sub-command.

properties.name: ShouldSkipMarkup
properties.help: Skip to markup the triple slash comments.

properties.name: BasePath
properties.help: Specify the base path to generate external link, {host}/{locale}/{basePath}.

properties.name: CssFilePath
properties.help: Specify the path for the css to generate pdf, default value is styles/default.css.

properties.name: ExcludedTocs
properties.help: Specify the toc files to be excluded.

properties.name: GeneratesAppendices
properties.help: Specify whether or not to generate appendices for not-in-TOC articles.

properties.name: GeneratesExternalLink
properties.help: Specify whether or not to generate external links for PDF.

properties.name: PdfHost
properties.help: Specify the hostname to link not-in-TOC articles.

properties.name: KeepRawFiles
properties.help: Specify whether or not to keep the intermediate html files that used to generate the PDF file. It it usually used in debug purpose. By default the value is false.

properties.name: LoadErrorHandling
properties.help: Specify how to handle pdf pages that fail to load: abort, ignore or skip(default abort), it is the same input as wkhtmltopdf --load-error-handling options.

properties.name: Locale
properties.help: Specify the locale of the pdf file.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Specify the name of the generated pdf.

properties.name: NoInputStreamArgs
properties.help: Do not use stdin when wkhtmltopdf is executed.

properties.name: RawOutputFolder
properties.help: Specify the output folder for the raw files, if not specified, raw files will by default be saved to _raw subfolder under output folder if keepRawFiles is set to true.

properties.name: Host
properties.help: Specify the hostname of the hosted website [localhost].

properties.name: Port
properties.help: Specify the port of the hosted website [8080].

properties.name: PrintHelpMessage
properties.help: Print help message for this sub-command.

properties.name: Command
properties.help: The command to execute.

properties.name: All
properties.help: If specified, all the available templates will be exported.

properties.name: OutputFolder
properties.help: Specify the output folder path for the exported templates.

properties.name: PrintHelpMessage
properties.help: Print help message for this sub-command.

logoptions.name: CorrelationId
logoptions.help: Specify the correlation id used for logging.

logoptions.name: LogFilePath
logoptions.help: Specify the file name to save processing log.

logoptions.name: LogLevel
logoptions.help: Specify to which log level will be logged. By default log level >= Info will be logged. The acceptable value could be Verbose, Info, Warning, Error.

logoptions.name: RepoRoot
logoptions.help: Specify the GIT repository root folder.

logoptions.name: WarningsAsErrors
logoptions.help: Specify if warnings should be treated as errors.
